about_the_game:
Welcome to Dungeum: An Oldschool Turn-Based Adventure in an Endless Dungeon!


Explore the infinite depths of Dungeum, a grid-based, turn-based dungeon crawler where every phase is a test of strategy and bravery. Are you ready to become a legend in a world where every step could be a treasure or a trap?



Endless Dungeons: Dive deep into ever-changing dungeons. Defeat monsters, conquer bosses, and unearth ancient treasures. With every victory, unlock the path to deeper, more perilous chambers.


Tactical Combat: Engage in slow-paced, strategic battles where every decision counts. Earn experience, items, and gold to fortify your journey.


Strategic Resets: Exiting a dungeon resets your progress but strategy is key—stock up on essentials and utilize your knowledge to explore further with each new attempt.


Equipment Upgrades: Use your loot wisely to enhance your gear in town, gearing up for the challenges that lie ahead.


Social Interaction: The town serves as a hub where you can interact with other players and NPCs. Buy potions, trade tips, and decorate your personal house with your dungeon finds.


Personal Sanctuary: Your house is not just a home but a gallery of your achievements. Display trophies and treasures as proof of your adventures.


Community Engagement: Join an active community of fellow dungeon explorers. Share stories, form alliances, and tackle the depths together.
Every login promises a new adventure in Dungeum. Will you emerge as the mightiest adventurer, or will the depths claim another soul?


Discover the Joy of Pet Breeding: Venture into the depths of Dungeum not only to conquer foes but also to discover and nurture over 2000 different pets! Will you find a mysterious egg waiting to be hatched, or will you choose to delve deeper into the art of breeding to create your own unique companions? The choice is yours in this vast world of adventure!

Join now and carve your path through the endless mysteries of Dungeum!

name: Dungeum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-2100T
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolutions 1920x1080 and up
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-2390T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Resolutions 1920x1080 and up

short_description: Embark on an endless turn-based adventure in Dungeum, a strategic dungeon crawler where every decision shapes your journey through treacherous depths.
